author: Liturgist
body: Is there any work going to support POSIX character classes in PowerShell regex processing?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: PowerShell regex processing simply depends on dotnet regex processing.  If you have any specific requests, you should probably open it on their repo https://github.com/dotnet/corefx and we would get it "for free"
